hero.title: The AI-native compliance layer for organizations

features.title: Comprehensive AI-Powered Compliance Suite
features.subtitle: We offer complete tools to automate and streamline your compliance processes across multiple regulatory frameworks.

aiOfficer.title: AI Compliance Officer
aiOfficer.description: AI-driven assistant that monitors systems, identifies issues, and suggests remediation.

workflows.title: Automated Workflows
workflows.description: Automate compliance processes to ensure consistency and minimize errors.

dataManagement.title: Data Management
dataManagement.description: Secure handling of sensitive data with built-in privacy controls.

multiFramework.title: Multi-Framework Support
multiFramework.subtitle: We cover multiple compliance frameworks from a single interface.
multiFramework.certDescription: Our ESG compliance solutions meet the highest standards of quality certification, ensuring reliable and trustworthy operation across all supported frameworks.

roles.title: Tailored for Every Role
roles.subtitle: Specialized interfaces for different roles in your organization.

managers.title: For Managers

contributors.title: For Contributors

auditors.title: For Auditors
auditors.description: Detailed audit trails and verification tools to validate compliance.

trust.title: Why Teams Trust Us with Compliance
trust.subtitle: Compliance used to be time-consuming. Now, it's automatic.

peaceOfMind.title: Peace of Mind, Powered by Automation
peaceOfMind.description: No more chasing employees or endless follow-ups. Our AI-driven platform ensures tasks get done—on time, every time—without manual reminders.

noManualWork.title: Say Goodbye to Manual Oversight
noManualWork.description: Our smart agents connect with your team directly via Slack and email, handling training, data collection, and policy sign-offs—so you don't have to.

realTime.title: Stay Ahead with Real-Time Visibility
realTime.description: Instantly see what's done, what's pending, and where the risks are. With continuous insights, you're always a step ahead of non-compliance.

quickLaunch.title: Launch in Minutes, Not Months
quickLaunch.description: No complex onboarding. No expensive consultants. Just a fast, seamless rollout that gets your team up and running—today.

allInOne.title: Everything You Need. One Platform.
allInOne.description: Manage SOC 2, ISO 27001, GDPR, and more—all in one place. Fully automated. Fully integrated. Fully under control.

trust.aiSubtitle: See how our platform transforms compliance from a burden into a competitive advantage
trust.agentMessage1: I've analyzed the latest data security policies and found 3 potential gaps that need attention.
trust.agentMessage2: Scheduling automated follow-ups with IT team members to collect necessary documentation.
